mapper.select: SELECT cr.coffee_request_idx as coffeeRequestIdx, cr.username as userName, cr.coffee_request_amount as coffeeRequestAmount, cr.coffee_request_address as coffeeRequestAddress, cr.coffee_request_phone as coffeeRequestPhone, cr.coffee_request_content as coffeeRequestContent, cr.coffee_request_date as coffeeRequestDate, ci.company_info_name as companyInfoName, ci.company_info_idx as companyInfoIdx FROM coffee_request AS cr INNER JOIN company_info AS ci ON cr.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM coffee_request_confirm AS crc WHERE cr.coffee_request_idx = crc.coffee_request_confirm_idx );

SELECT ci.company_info_name as companyInfoName, crc.username, cr.coffee_request_phone as coffeeRequestPhone, cr.coffee_request_address as coffeeRequestAddress, cr.coffee_request_amount as coffeeRequestAmount, crc.coffee_request_confirm_date, crc.coffee_request_confirm_status, crc.coffee_request_confirm_content, crc.coffee_request_confirm_date, crc.admin_username FROM coffee_request_confirm AS crc INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = crc.company_info_idx INNER JOIN coffee_request cr ON cr.coffee_request_idx = crc.coffee_request_idx;

SELECT ci.company_info_name as companyInfoName, ci.company_info_phone as companyInfoPhone, ci.company_info_address as companyInfoAddress FROM coffee_request_confirm crc INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = crc.company_info_idx;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coffee_request_confirm( username, coffee_request_idx, company_info_idx, coffee_request_confirm_status, coffee_request_confirm_content, admin_username, coffee_request_confirm_date )VALUES(#{userName},#{coffeeRequestIdx},#{companyInfoIdx},#{coffeeRequestConfirmStatus},#{coffeeRequestConfirmContent},#{adminUsername},now());
mapper.select: SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, cr.coffee_request_address AS coffeeRequestAddress, cr.coffee_request_amount AS coffeeRequestAmount, cr.coffee_request_phone AS coffeeRequestPhone, cd.coffee_delivery_idx AS coffeeDeliveryIdx, cd.coffee_request_idx AS coffeeRequestIdx, ci.company_info_idx AS companyInfoIdx, cd.username AS userName, cd.coffee_delivery_track AS coffeeDeliveryTrack, cd.coffee_delivery_status AS coffeeDeliveryStatus, cd.coffee_delivery_company AS coffeeDeliveryCompany, cd.coffee_delivery_complete AS coffeeDeliveryComplete FROM coffee_delivery AS cd INNER JOIN company_info ci ON cd.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx INNER JOIN coffee_request AS cr ON cr.coffee_request_idx = cd.coffee_request_idx;
